ca.ualberta.cs.c301f12t01.localStorage
Class DeviceStorage

java.lang.Object
  ca.ualberta.cs.c301f12t01.localStorage.DeviceStorage
All Implemented Interfaces:
StorageInterface, java.util.Observer
public class DeviceStorage
extends java.lang.Object
implements StorageInterface, java.util.Observer

Obtaining an instance of this class allows for the storing and retrieving of Tasks, Reports, Requests and Responses from the SQLDatabase. This class is responsible for creating a connection to a database in Android and providing the functionality to write and retrieve objects from it

Author:
Neil Borle
